main.title: SmartNode Solutions - Automation for Small Businesses
main.description: Streamline your workflow with our powerful AI Automation Solutions. Built for modern teams.

team.name: Javier Noguera
team.bio: Javier brings a unique blend of engineering and low-code expertise, building the technical foundation for our tailored automation solutions. He is the architect behind our mission to simplify complex workflows.

team.name: Roselis Perez
team.bio: With a Master's in Project Management, Roselis ensures every client project is executed flawlessly. Her focus on clear communication and methodical execution guarantees that our solutions deliver tangible results.

about.mainDescription: At SmartNode Solutions, we believe that powerful automation should be accessible to every business, regardless of size. Weâ€™re on a mission to free small business owners and their teams from tedious, repetitive tasks so they can focus on what truly matters: growth and innovation.
about.missionParagraph1: We are dedicated to empowering small and medium-sized businesses with custom-built AI automation solutions. Our approach is to work closely with you to understand your unique challenges and build powerful, scalable workflows using low-code, no-code, and full code tools that deliver a clear return on investment.
about.missionParagraph2: Our vision is to be the go-to partner for businesses seeking to harness the power of AI to work smarter, not harder. We don't just build solutions; we build long-term partnerships based on trust, expertise, and a shared commitment to your success.
principles: Founded on the principle of accessible technology
Dedicated to tailored solutions, not one-size-fits-all products
Expertise in low-code, no-code, and full code platforms
about.whyTitle: Why We Do What We Do
about.whyDescription: We started SmartNode Solutions to eliminate the daily frustrations caused by manual, repetitive work. Our motivation comes from seeing businesses thrive once they are freed from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on innovation, strategy, and serving their customers better.
about.leadershipDescription: We are a small but mighty team of builders and strategists, united by a passion for solving complex business problems with elegant, effective automation.

Testimonials.title: Empowering
Testimonials.description: Hear directly from the small business owners and teams who are achieving new levels of efficiency and growth with our tailored AI automation solutions.

testimonials.name: Maria Sanchez
testimonials.content: Our administrative tasks used to take hours. This AI solution handles everything seamlessly, freeing us to focus on our craft. Truly a game-changer for our small business!

testimonials.name: John Miller
testimonials.content: The custom workflow automation implemented by the agency has drastically improved our order processing and customer service. It's like having an extra team member.

testimonials.name: Aisha Khan
testimonials.content: We needed a specific solution for patient scheduling and reminders. This agency delivered a perfect, tailored AI system that fits our clinic's unique needs.

testimonials.name: Roberto Gomez
testimonials.content: Their expertise in AI for logistics is unmatched. The custom solution they built streamlined our inventory management and reduced errors significantly.

testimonials.name: Sophia Lee
testimonials.content: We thought AI was only for big corporations, but this agency showed us how accessible and powerful it is for small businesses. Our marketing campaigns are now smarter and more efficient.

testimonials.name: Kevin Wong
testimonials.content: The personalized approach to automation made all the difference. They truly understood our pain points and delivered a solution that has transformed our daily operations.

sections.heading: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information to provide and improve our AI automation services. This may include: Contact Information: Name, email address, phone number, and company name when you fill out a contact form or schedule a consultation. Usage Data: Information about how you interact with our website, such as your IP address, browser type, pages viewed, and the time and date of your visit. Service Data: Details about your business workflows and processes, which you provide to us for the purpose of building and implementing a custom AI solution.

sections.heading: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect for the following purposes: To provide and maintain our services. To communicate with you about your projects, consultations, or inquiries. To improve our website, services, and marketing efforts. To personalize your experience and provide tailored solutions. For billing and administrative purposes.

sections.heading: 3. Data Sharing and Disclosure
sections.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your information with third-party service providers (e.g., hosting partners, analytics providers) only to the extent necessary to operate our business and provide our services. We may also disclose your information if required by law.

sections.heading: 4. Your Privacy Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, update, or request the deletion of your personal information. If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us at contact@smartnode.solutions.

sections.heading: 5. Data Security
sections.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

sections.heading: 1. Our Services
sections.content: SmartNode Solutions provides expert guidance and custom-built AI automation workflows for small businesses. Our services are designed to streamline your operations, increase efficiency, and drive measurable growth.

sections.heading: 2. User Obligations
sections.content: When using our services, you agree to: Provide accurate and complete information. Use the services only for lawful purposes. Not interfere with the security or operation of our services. Maintain the confidentiality of your account information.

sections.heading: 3. Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content, trademarks, and intellectual property on our website and in our services are the property of SmartNode Solutions. You may not use, copy, or distribute any part of our intellectual property without our express written consent.

sections.heading: 4. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: SmartNode Solutions is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from your use of our services. Our total liability will not exceed the amount you have paid to us for the specific service in question.

sections.heading: 5. Termination
sections.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to our services at any time, for any reason, including if you violate these Terms.

sections.heading: 1. What Are Cookies?
sections.content: Cookies are small text files placed on your device by a website that you visit. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide a better user experience.

sections.heading: 2. How We Use Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies for various purposes: Essential Cookies: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. Analytics Cookies: We use cookies to collect anonymous data about how visitors use our website. This helps us understand user behavior and improve our site's performance. Marketing Cookies: These cookies help us show you relevant advertisements based on your interests.

sections.heading: 3. Your Choices
sections.content: You have the right to choose whether to accept or reject cookies. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Be aware that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.
